name: Hallowen
storyline: Halloween is an American horror film directed by David Gordon Green and written by Jeff Fradley, Green and Danny McBride. It is the eleventh of the Halloween franchise, resuming forty years after the events of the original film, without taking into account the previous sequences. The co-creator of the series, John Carpenter, serves as composer, executive producer and creative consultant for the film, [11] to be distributed by Universal Pictures, his first participation in the Halloween franchise since the 1982 film Halloween III: Season of the Witch.
